data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Pinus mughus (Krummholz pine) from sample RABAS-132

Exposition SW, Slope 10 deg, Geology: saurer Sandstein, Tree line 2300 m, av. Tree height 12 m, Tree cover 40%, Herb cover 70%, Vegatation type: Arctostaphylo uva-ursi-Pinetum uncinatae, Film number: 485A
